name: Icarus (itch) (enevis, brombropaul, MadamBrosper)
description:
Pilot your ship in a desperate attempt to stop the sun from consuming the earth! Repair machines, refuel the engines, and keep the ship running long enough to reach it.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Interact / Pickup Item / Skip Cutscene - J
  • Cancel / Drop Item - K

Made for LOWREZJAM 2022

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Adam Trosper (MadamBrosper): Coding/Music
